CVE-2019-20377 TopList before 2019-09-03 allows XSS via a title. https://t.co/G4MgyRZ5Mo
CVE-2020-6840 In mruby 2.1.0, there is a use-after-free in hash_slice in mrbgems/mruby-hash-ext/src/hash-ext.c. https://t.co/o3r7l2DL6A
CVE-2020-6839 In mruby 2.1.0, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in mrb_str_len_to_dbl in string.c. https://t.co/Lt770pgeuB
CVE-2020-6838 In mruby 2.1.0, there is a use-after-free in hash_values_at in mrbgems/mruby-hash-ext/src/hash-ext.c. https://t.co/vjIIdYM4DR

CVE-2020-6377 Use after free in audio in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.117 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. https://t.co/xRWVH3sX9Y

CVE-2019-19475 An issue was discovered in ManageEngine Applications Manager 14 with Build 14360. Integrated PostgreSQL which is built-in in Applications Manager is prone to attack due to lack of file permission security. The malicious users who are in “... https://t.co/X90QqHvLyH

CVE-2019-13767 Use after free in media picker in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.88 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. https://t.co/f43g81U8w2
CVE-2020-6835 An issue was discovered in Bftpd before 5.4. There is a heap-based off-by-one error during file-transfer error checking. https://t.co/VhC1Uz501Y

CVE-2012-4603 Citrix XenApp Online Plug-in for Windows 12.1 and earlier, and Citrix Receiver for Windows 3.2 and earlier could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by convincing a target to open a specially crafted file from an SMB or WebDAV... https://t.co/JEwG8gTQoo

CVE-2012-3821 A Security Bypass vulnerability exists in the activate.asp page in Arial Software Campaign Enterprise 11.0.551, which could let a remote malicious user modify the SerialNumber field. https://t.co/N9nDDpmlb9

CVE-2019-18588 Dell EMC Unisphere for PowerMax versions prior to 9.1.0.9, Dell EMC Unisphere for PowerMax versions prior to 9.0.2.16, and Dell EMC PowerMax OS 5978.221.221 and 5978.479.479 contain a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An authentic... https://t.co/MaAUCy6eQa
CVE-2011-5020 An SQL Injection vulnerability exists in the ID parameter in Online TV Database 2011. https://t.co/FQIEXMtVO4

CVE-2019-18194 TotalAV 2020 4.14.31 has a quarantine flaw that allows privilege escalation. Exploitation uses an NTFS directory junction to restore a malicious DLL from quarantine into the system32 folder. https://t.co/9gZnhyesWz
CVE-2019-14306 Ricoh SP C250DN 1.06 devices have Incorrect Access Control (issue 2 of 2). https://t.co/KBlOhxWGQz
CVE-2019-14304 Ricoh SP C250DN 1.06 devices allow CSRF. https://t.co/IWkvdw3mWt
